t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 2 days ago - Prior to the agreement, a limited selection of Nike products were available on Amazon via third-party sellers. But Nike was a "gated" brand on Amazon, meaning it was highly restricted to prevent counterfeit and low-quality items.

t: E-Commerce-Riese Amazon: Vorteile eines Amazon Brand Stores
s: September 3, 2024 - Noch zentraler ist allerdings die ... auf Amazon. Gerade KMUs verkaufen zwar Produkte über den Marktplatz, aber treten dabei kaum mit ihrer Marke in den Vordergrund.
